identifier: 2022--02--22--en--myrss--Katherine Rosman, Ben Sisario, Mike Isaac and Adam Satariano--NewsArticle--https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F2022%2F02%2F17%2Farts%2Fmusic%2Fspotify-joe-rogan-misinformation.html
headline: Spotify's Joe Rogan Deal Is Said to Be Worth Over $200 Million
description: The deal that brought his podcast to Spotify is said to be worth over $200 million, more than was previously known. Accusations that he spreads misinformation have roiled the company.

author.name: Katherine Rosman, Ben Sisario, Mike Isaac and Adam Satariano

headline_zh-Hans: Spotify的乔-罗根交易据说价值超过2亿美元
headline_zh-Hant: Spotify的喬-羅根交易據說價值超過2億美元
description_zh-Hans: 据悉，将他的播客带到Spotify的交易价值超过2亿美元，比之前所知的要多。对他传播错误信息的指责使该公司陷入困境。
description_zh-Hant: 據悉，將他的播客帶到Spotify的交易價值超過2億美元，比之前所知的要多。對他傳播錯誤信息的指責使該公司陷入困境。
